HDG.LOG.content: a protection in which what lies before remains (bleibt) laid down: stored, laid away, secured & deposited in unconcealment (Unverborgenheit), sheltered in unconcealment > the keisthai of upokeimenon: presencing (Anwesen) of that which lies before us into unconcealment: legein concerns safety (Geborgenheit), safekeeping, gathering appropriate to such a laying [what about annihilation?], safety of that which comes together into presence (des beisammen-Anwesenden)

HDG.LOG.content: unconcealing of concealed into unconcealment is very presencing of what is present: we call this [who is we?] Being of beings > expression (Ausdruck) & signification (Bedeutung) characteristics of language but don’t genuinely reach into realm of primordial, not capable of determining this realm in its primary characteristics (anfänglichen Wesensprägung) > man never astonished by event (Ereignis) that covers over primary meaning of Sprache, didn’t discern in it mystery (Geheimnis) to discover essential dispensation (Schickung) of Being to men

HDG.BC.content: guidewords not propositions passed around as assertions “about” a “philosophical standpoint”: treated as such they’d miss the essential [Heidegger beyond Heidegger] > this reflection doesn’t have to cling to phrasing of what’s said here > main point: notice something neglected, notice it w/out haste [slow down], don’t seek its utility or purpose; have courage to recognize what holds sway (waltet) in domain of ontological difference [differance?]

HDG.BC.content: in modernity, never before achieved “objectivity” supposed to be reached because man has become a subject > in modernity, Being anthropomorphized, we don’t come into relation w/ Being itself, only what humans represent it as [can we ever come into relation to it???], “humanize” Being

HDG.BC.content: Being “is”: doesn’t Being become a being in this phrase, become what it’s supposed to be differentiated from? can it ever become manifest as Being?

HDG.BT.content: in investigations where thing is deeply veiled, don’t overestimate results: constantly face possibility of disclosing an even more primordial/universal horizon from which to draw answer to question: “What is Being?” [Seinsfrage] > must reawaken question of Being before achieving positive results, arrive at a field where we can come to terms w/ it in a way that can be controlled [totally other—then teleological control?]

HDG.WM.content: “what is the nothing?”: every answer to this question impossible from start; re: nothing, question/answer inherently absurd > nothing is negation of totality of beings, nonbeing pure & simple > the question, the problem, the logic, the problem only devours itself [?] (nur sich selbst verzehrendes Problem ansetzen)

HDG.WM.content: no annihilation (Vernichtung) of whole of beings takes place in anxiety > nothing doesn’t attract, essentially repelling (abweisend) > nothing itself nihilates (das Nichts selbst nichtet), grants the nothing, not submitted to calculation of annihilation or negation (Verneinung) > nihilation manifests beings in heretofore concealed strangeness as what is radically other (schlechthin Andere) [totally other] re: nothing > originally nihilating nothing brings Dasein, for 1st time, before beings as such—in anxiety original openness of Being

HDG.IWM.content: overcoming of metaphysics [Destruction] corresponded to endeavor to first learn to attend to oblivion of Being, to experience this oblivion, absorb this experience into relation of Being to man, preserve (verwahren) it there [ontological difference & Being] > in the need (Not) belonging to oblivion of Being, question: “What is metaphysics?” perhaps most necessary for thought > [Destruction] representational thought relinquished to thinking brought to pass (ereignetes) by Being itself, in thrall to Being (um dem Sein höriges Denken) [MOP, telos]: more thoughtful our thinking becomes, more purely our thinking will stand of its own accord in sole action appropriate to it [attention to Being]

HDG.QB.content: by no means easier to say “being” than to speak of the nothing > shows how once more, inevitably, everything depends (ankommt) on correct saying (rechte Sagen), the logos whose essence logic/dialectic of metaphysics can never experience > is it due to “being” (as Same) that our saying fails? all too readily suspected as so-called “mysticism”? > [beyond Being, Derrida] would the crossing of the line leave language of fundamental words to whim of those who are speaking? enough for language to be universally comprehensible? or do other [uniquely unique] laws/measures prevail here [totally other]? (these questions are scarcely beginning to become worthy of question—to feel home in them)

HDG.QB.content: what is the Ort of the nothing? > thinking continually led around/chased around the Same as though a magical circle, w/out ever being able to approach this Same [beyond Being] > “good definition” of nihilism points us toward realm that demands a different saying (anderes Sagen) [totally other?] > if turning belongs to “Being,” so that latter resides (beruht) in former, then “Being” dissolves [auflösen] into the turning [logic of exemplarity] > [the first] X Being, initially to prevent “Being” from being a being that then stands face-to-face w/ human (Being not independent from human being) [Being needs human]

HDG.QB.content: recollective thinking (Andenken) has task of attending to this concealment, in which unconcealment is grounded [how do you know that, if its essence has not yet been revealed?] > recollect not what becomes past: but all enduring (allem Währen) that each case (je) of Ereignis of X Being grants (gewährt)

HDG.QB.content: when question “What is…?” concerned w/ discussing (erörtern) the surpassing (Überstieg) of beings by Being, this surpassing immediately calls into question elements distinguished from one another in that distinction (Unterscheidung) [beyond ontological difference], the distinction in which doctrine of metaphysics moves, or from which metaphysics receives basic outline (Grundriss) of its language (essence/existence, what-being/that-being)

HDG.QB.content: question “What is metaphysics?” at first relies indiscriminately on distinction Being/being, but when it asks of Being’s surpassing of beings, becomes one of those questions that stabs itself in the heart, not so that thinking may thereby die, but live in transformed manner [living suicide] > ponder what is other than beings [Being as totally other?]

[Being not crossed out]

HDG.FS.content: xynon means same as koinon? > for Heraclitus, xynienai: going together; koinon merely katholon, the universal, i.e. “what belongs equally to all despite differences” [a going together that’s not the universal common] > co-belonging of xynon is differing (verschieden) (to diapheromenon), this alone can bring together (zusammenbringen): no night alone, no day alone, co-belonging of day/night (their very being) [not dialectic?]

HDG.FS.content: kosmos is fire (pyr): (threefold sense) rising flame (aufsteigende Flamme), brooding glow (brütende Glut), radiating light (strahlendes Licht) > for Heraclitus (unlike modern man who reduces word to one meaning), this manifold richness is kosmos, never isolated, shimmers ungraspably through everything

HDG.FS.content: unthinkable/unachievable that human no longer corresponds to what appears > in age of world impoverishment (in der Verarmung der Welt), only see chemical processes > Descartes not part of this, the 1st to see lightning flash, what is decisive (Entscheidende): das er gesehen werde > can’t know why it gave itself in this way, at least know in scientific sense: “destiny of being” not history as succession of events

HDG.FS.content: “reflection,” Latin re-flexere, turning-back upon itself (zurückzuwenden), towards the ego > in Descartes, ego, as cogitans, appears as cogitatum, object > in Kant’s language: “it must be possible for the I think to accompany all my representations” > transcendental apperception re: finite essence of man > Hegel absolutizes finite understanding, brings power of conjoining to absolute power: “what is finite w/ man becomes the infinite Absolute” > infinite as sublation of finite

HDG.FS.content: Plato names eidōlon as mē on (“un-being”), distinguishes from ouk on, sheer non-being [cf. pp. 39, 42] > eidōlon also distinguished from eidos, that which shows itself, what one sees > but one can’t reach eidos w/out eidōlon, table obscured by wood of which it’s made > Aristotle brings Ideas back to earth, eidos becomes morphē of a tode ti in motion/rest: kinēsis (and for Aristotle all moves) defined as energeai (entelecheia), thus energeia highest determination of being

HDG.FS.content: what sort of positing is that by which Absolute appears for consciousness? > in Greek, positing is thesis, apothēkē means same as apophansis, let matter stand here from itself, as it is, i.e. presences (anwest) > modern positing, however, is closest to Latin repraesentatio, the re- refers back to ego cogito, re- as “back to me,” thus that which stands becomes object (all this covered over by presumptions of idealism)

HDG.FS.content: distinguish pure nomination (onomazein) from making a proposition (legein ti kata tinos) > simple nomination (Nennung): one who names intervenes only to step into background before being, being is pure phenomenon > proposition (Aussage): one who makes proposition takes part, ranges over being in order to speak about it, being is only upokeimenon then, name only a residue (Rest) of apophansis

HDG.FS.content: difficult to accomplish anew what Greeks did when they thought Being as an appearing outside concealment (phusis), still we ask: what occurs in fact of arising-into-alētheia? > the overabundance (Überfülle), the excess (Übermass) of what presences (Anwesende), thus why Thales can only look to the heavens, relation to this thrust of presence is thaumazein [wonder] [height & excess] > in extreme opposition, when astronauts landed on moon, moon as moon disappeared, only a calculable parameter (Rechnungsgrösse) for technological enterprise of humans

HDG.FS.content: the a of alētheia, a privation that corresponds to excess, privation is not negation, the concealment in unconcealment (which grows more powerful the more strongly it becomes what phuein indicates [?])

HDG.FS.content: how does Platonic idea (eidos) correspond to what Greeks named presence, ousia, the most extreme excess? for Plato, to change, to alter oneself (sich ändern): abwesen (to absence)—idea as pure presence, never absencing, self-maintaining-making-present, presencing presence (anwesende Anwesenheit) as what’s there in excess, ontos on (Nietzsche had strong sense of this, Twilight of…)

HDG.FS.content: Being and Time asks not about a being but about “is,” addresses the question from perspective of meaning (Sinnes) of Being > “meaning of being”: understandable on basis (im Ausgang) of “project region” unfolded by “understanding of being” [hermeneutic circle?] > understanding: standing before, residing before (sich aufhalten vor), holding (halten) oneself at height of what stands before, being strong enough to hold out (auszuhalten)

HDG.FS.content: Aristotle asks what’s extant (seiend) in time?—this is a reduction, a temporal predetermination is operative > for Kant, time conceived in horizon of ob-jectivity, that which holds itself steady in constant flow of changing now > Heidegger explains how short-circuiting of meditation on time covred over meaning of being > “thinking must consequently attempt to further a new—non-metaphysical—way of thinking time [overcoming metaphysics], not governed, surreptitiously, by ontological presupposition of beinghood of time, which concentrates only on what presences

HDG.FS.content: Heidegger calls analysis of temporality of Dasein a non-metaphysical thinking of time > time no longer series of now moments, but horizon for understanding of being > analytic of Dasein provides equipment making possible sense of being in non-metaphysical signification: destruction achieves its goal (ihr Ziel gebracht) [?????]—but, various coverings of originary sense of being maintain essential relation to what they cover over, so that metaphysics can be read positively, transformations of original meaning all belonging to single destiny—Seinsgeschick

HDG.FS.content: no destinal (geschickliche) epoch of Ereignis: sending is from enowning (Das Schicken ist aus dem Ereignen) > return to Greeks only has meaning as a return to Being [?] > “step back (Schritt züruck)” (step that retreats [züruckgeht] from metaphysics [overcoming metaphysics]) has sole meaning of enabling (ermöglichen) glance ahead (Vorausblick) to what comes (was kommt) [to-come], thinking begins anew: in essence of technology thought catches sight of heralding portent (verdeckenden Vor-Schein), die verbergende Vor-Erscheinung des Ereignisses selbst

HDG.FS.content: as technology unfolds objectivity (Gegenständlichkeit) (as a manner of sending) transforms more into standing reservedness (Beständlichkeit) > no longer objects today only standing reserves (beings held in readiness for being consumed [Verbrauchtwerden]), no longer substances but subsistances > energy politics, politics of agriculture: systematic ordering of space w/in general planning, directed toward future exploitation (Ausbeutung), everything arranged in horizon of utility: orderability (Bestellbarkeit) [better than Beherrschung] of what is to be seized > for example: forest as “greenspace” (stock, supply, means)

HDG.FS.content: human belongs to openness of Being > Being, for its opening, needs man as the there of its manifestation [Larry’s emphasis] > Ge-stell helps us see that human is “used by being (vom Sein gebraucht),” also the shepherd of being, berger (French is better here), one who provides shelter > that Being needs something of human to be: finitude of being must be assumed (not absolutely for itself, pointed contradiction to Hegel)

Heidegger, “categorial intuition” focal point of Husserlian thought > ground of sensuous what Husserl calls hyle, that which affects sensibly, the sense data (blue, black, spatial extension) > along w/ sense data comes the object: object can’t be perceived sensibly (fact that object is object doesn’t arise from sensuous intuition)

HDG.FS.content: Husserl attempts to articulate what Kant simply characterizes as concept of form: thus the given (Gegebenen) of intuition, categorial intuition, category more than a form > categorial as given

HDG.FS.content: for Husserl, substantiality [categorial?], non-appearance, (of book), enables what appears to appear, more apparent that what itself appears > w/ categorial intution, Husserl freed being from its attachment to judgment reorients entire field of investigation > if Heidegger poses question of meaning of being, must already be beyond being, understood as being of beings [Befragte: Being; das Erfragte: meaning of Being]

HDG.FS.content: to unfold question of meaning of Being, Being must be given > Husserl succeeded in this making present of Being, phenomenally present in category > Husserl gave Heidegger ground: “being” no mere concept, no pure abstraction > Husserl doesn’t inquire forth into Being after reaching Being as given, doesn’t ask what it means > no question for Husserl, “being” means being-object (but objectivity is a mode of presence)

HDG.FS.content: subjectivity itself not questioned re: its being > since Descartes, subjectivity is fundamentum inconcussum, the barrier to unfolding Seinsfrage ——the “making-present-to-oneself (Selbstvergegenwärtigung)” of consciousness takes place in immanence, what I am conscious of is present to me, in my consciousness > in Being and Time, “thing” no longer in consciousness, but in the world > despite intentionality, Husserl remains trapped in immanence: Husserl retrieves proper consistency of object, saves object, but by situating it in immanence of consciousness

HDG.FS.content: surrender consciousness, join new domain (Bereich) of Dasein, must step into it, enter it, to stand in relation to what isn’t man > entry into this domain not produced by thought undertaken by Heidegger: to believe thinking capable of changing place of man, still conceive it (vorstellen) on model of production (Produktion); rather, thinking prepares man for possibility (Möglichkeit) of corresponding to such an entry (Einkehr) [so attention is delayed!]

HDG.FS.content: Marx (like Feuerbach): “criticism of religion ends w/ teaching that man is the highest being for man” > Heidegger’s Marx interpretation not political, concerned w/ Being in manner it destines itself: w/ Marx, position of most extreme nihilism is reached [what about Nietzsche?] > if man is the highest being for man, Being (as Being) is nothing (nichts) (nihil) anymore for man > to understand Marx politically: make politics a mode of self-production (perfectly consistent w/ Marx’s thought) (Marx’s statement decidedly metaphysical)

HDG.MA.content: Nobel prize winners declare “Science is a road to a happier human life” > this statement as far as possible from reflective insight into our age, forget to ponder/ask: what is ground that enabled modern technology to discover/set free new energies in nature? > nature has become a “gigantic gasoline station” [Ge-stell] (technical epoch developed in 17th century Europe)

HDG.MA.content: if hydrogen bombs don’t explode, uncanny change in world moves upon us > what is most uncanny: (not technical advance itself) being unprepared for transformation, inability to confront what’s dawning meditatively

HDG.CCP.content: nature of thinking perhaps fixed in Gelassenheit, if we don’t conceive of it as re-presenting [effort & attention risks representing nature of thinking] > what am I to do? nothing but wait > what are we to wait for? no one knows—but don’t give up your path

HDG.CCP.content: things appearing in Gegnet no longer objects, no longer stand opposite us, no longer stand at all > they lie, “rest in the return to the aiding of the expanse of their self-belonging” > there can be rest where rest is the seat/reign of all movement > we can’t really describe what he have named > non, any description would reify it > but, it lets itself be named & thus we can think about it (not representationally) > perhaps we are close to being released into nature of thinking…through waiting for its nature [arrival?]

HDG.CCP.content: waiting (warten) is not awaiting (erwarten): done waiting when we represent what we are waiting for > remaining is a returning > openness itself is Gegnet, into which we’re released by waiting when we think > thinking: coming-into-the-nearness of distance > how come you suddenly could wait?

HDG.CCP.content: how movement comes from rest suddenly clearer to me > scientist causes great embarrassment, asking: “how far is it really Gelassenheit into which I tried to let myself?” > what we designate w/ a word doesn’t have that word hanging on it (like a name plate) > whatever we name has been nameless before > how can we decide the adequacy of a name? or is all designation arbitrary? > is there the nameless at all? or does the name not occur to us? > p. 71 perhaps names are not the result of designation but the occurring together of the nameable, name, & named (nature of words)

Nietzsche’s On the Genea…] > noble abides in origins of its nature [habituate to your heart?]

HDG.DL.content: w/ first experience of phenomenon, Greeks didn’t press present beings into opposing objectness (Gegenständigkeit) > phainesthai: a being assumes its radiance (Scheinen), in which it appears (erscheinen) > Das Erscheinen (appearance) still Grundzug of Anwesen von Anwesende, as [beings] rise into unconcealment (Entbergung) ——Heidegger doesn’t think appearance in Greek or Kantian sense > but, what’s decisive (ankommt) [arrival?] is difficult, calls (verlangt) for simple/free vision (Blick)

HDG.DL.content: Iki: breath of stillness of luminous delight (Entzückens) > delight: what ensnares (Entziehen), carries away (Hinzücken)—into stillness > delight is the same kind as the hint that beckons on, to and fro (des Fort- und Hin- und Her-winkens) > hint is message of the veiling that opens up (lichtenden Verhüllens) > so all presence (Anwesen) has its source in grace (Anmut): pure delight of the calling stillness (rufenden Stille)

HDG.DL.content: many a man could be drawn into prologue (Vorspiel) of a messenger-course, if he keeps himself ready (bereithält) [prepares] for a dialogue of language > take some steps along a course (Gang), which entrusts (anvertraut) itself to the Wesen of Saying, which promises (zusagt) > let’s be glad if it not only seems so but is so [hope of arrival?] > what then? the farewell (Abschied) of all “It is (Es ist)” comes to pass (ereignet sich)

HDG.LP.content: site (Ort), [originally means] die Spitze des Speers (point of the spear) [Derrida repeatedly refers to this statement], gathers into itself, to the highest and most extreme (Äusserste), a gathering that penetrates (durchdringt)/pervades (durchwest) everything > a site gathers & preserves (verwahrt) what it gathers, not like an encapsulated shell (Kapsel), but by shining through, lighting up, and thus releasing (entlässt) what it gathers to its own nature

HDG.WL.content: acc. Aristotle [classical architectonic (Baugefüge) structure of language], letters show sounds, sounds show passions of soul, passions of soul show matters that arouse them (be-treffenden Sachen) > showing (Zeigen) holds up this classical structure > relation btwn Showing and what it shows (Gezeigten) becomes conventional relation btwn sign (Zeichen) & its signification (Bezeichnetem) > transformation (Änderung) of sign from something that shows (Zeigenden) to something that designates (Bezeichnenden): a change in the nature of truth
HDG.WL.linkedContent: acc. Aristotle [classical architectonic (Baugefüge) structure of language], letters show sounds, sounds show passions of soul, passions of soul show matters that arouse them (be-treffenden Sachen) > showing (Zeigen) holds up this classical structure > relation btwn Showing and what it shows (Gezeigten) becomes conventional relation btwn sign (Zeichen) & its signification (Bezeichnetem) > transformation (Änderung) of sign from something that shows (Zeigenden) to something that designates (Bezeichnenden): a change in the nature of truth

HDG.WL.content: since the Greeks, beings (Seiende) experienced as what is present (Anwesende) > since language is, the speaking that occurs belongs to what is present [phono-logocentrism]
HDG.WL.linkedContent: since the Greeks, beings (Seiende) experienced as what is present (Anwesende) > since language is, the speaking that occurs belongs to what is present [phono-logocentrism]

HDG.WL.content: what is speaking (Sprechen), the expression of thought, if we think of its origin as the inner activity of spirit (inneren Geistestätigkeit)? > acc. modern thought, labor of spirit (Arbeit des Geistes) is a setting/positing (Setzen) (thesis), spirit conceived as subject, represented w/in subject-object model (Schema), so positing must be synthesis btwn subject/object

HDG.WL.content: Humboldt regards language as a world and world view (Weltansicht) > he doesn’t think language as language, but language as chief source of historical-spiritual development of man > language as a world view of a human subjectivity > Humboldt reads language as energeia, but thinks energeia in wholly un-Greek manner, via Leibniz’s monadology as activity of subject: language is turned in direction of man > Humboldt doesn’t consider the Sprachwesen (linguistic nature) of the nature of language (Wesen der Sprache): the being of language, that it abides (währt), remains gathered in what it grants itself
HDG.WL.linkedContent: Humboldt regards language as a world and world view (Weltansicht) > he doesn’t think language as language, but language as chief source of historical-spiritual development of man > language as a world view of a human subjectivity > Humboldt reads language as energeia, but thinks energeia in wholly un-Greek manner, via Leibniz’s monadology as activity of subject: language is turned in direction of man > Humboldt doesn’t consider the Sprachwesen (linguistic nature) of the nature of language (Wesen der Sprache): the being of language, that it abides (währt), remains gathered in what it grants itself

HDG.WL.content: everything spoken stems, in many ways, from unspoken (either not yet spoken or beyond reach of speaking) > so that which is spoken can appear cut off from speaking/speakers, but it alone offers (entgegenhält) what they attend to (verhalten), regardless of how they stay (aufhalten) w/in spoken/unspoken
HDG.WL.linkedContent: everything spoken stems, in many ways, from unspoken (either not yet spoken or beyond reach of speaking) > so that which is spoken can appear cut off from speaking/speakers, but it alone offers (entgegenhält) what they attend to (verhalten), regardless of how they stay (aufhalten) w/in spoken/unspoken

HDG.WL.content: what is unspoken doesn’t just lack voice, it is what remains unsaid (Ungesagte), the not yet shown, that which has yet to reach appearance > that which must remain unspoken is Geheimnis (secret, mystery), abides (verweilt) in concealment as unshowable
HDG.WL.linkedContent: what is unspoken doesn’t just lack voice, it is what remains unsaid (Ungesagte), the not yet shown, that which has yet to reach appearance > that which must remain unspoken is Geheimnis (secret, mystery), abides (verweilt) in concealment as unshowable

HDG.WL.content: even w/out organs, language speaks (Sprache spricht) > language speaks by saying, i.e. showing > this is how language speaks: language as showing, reaches into all regions of presences (Anwesens), summoning what is present (Anwesendes) to appear & fade > what language says (Sagen) wells up (entquillt) from what has been said and the still remaining unsaid Sage, which pervades (durchzieht) the Aufriss des Sprachwesens
HDG.WL.linkedContent: even w/out organs, language speaks (Sprache spricht) > language speaks by saying, i.e. showing > this is how language speaks: language as showing, reaches into all regions of presences (Anwesens), summoning what is present (Anwesendes) to appear & fade > what language says (Sagen) wells up (entquillt) from what has been said and the still remaining unsaid Sage, which pervades (durchzieht) the Aufriss des Sprachwesens

HDG.WL.content: a way (Weg): allows us to reach something (lässt gelangen) [arrival] > peculiarity (Eigentümliche) of language conceals itself > that we are allowed to listen, we belong to language, this belonging contains actual presence (eigentlich Wesende) of way to language [proximity to facticity of language] > essence of Saying will only make itself manifest (bekunden) if we attend (achten) w/ great instancy to what the foregoing Erläuterung has offered

HDG.WL.content: where does the showing spring (rührt) from? slow down, enough to heed (achten) what stirs/quickens (regt) in the showing, and bears this quickness out
HDG.WL.linkedContent: where does the showing spring (rührt) from? slow down, enough to heed (achten) what stirs/quickens (regt) in the showing, and bears this quickness out

HDG.WL.content: along the way, what looks like a tangle untangles [arrival?], release/light of way-making movement > movement brings Saying to speech, Saying keeps way open > die Be-wëgung der Sage zur Sprache ist das entbindende Band, das verbindet, indem es er-eignet [bond that binds by appropriating] > language delivered (entbunden) to its own freedom: concerned solely w/ itself > but language as Saying not only self-seeking, the appropriating showing disregards precisely itself, to free what is shown to its proper appearance [withdrawal of language, Saying, Ereignis]

HDG.WL.content: if to know means to see something in wholeness of its nature, we can’t see the nature of language as such, in the round, because we belong w/in Saying, can only say something by saying it after Saying > language is monologue [cf. MONL], has its structure in the Aufriss of Saying: 1) language alone speaks authentically 2) language speaks lonesomely (einsam) > the some in lonesome, the same, Greek hama, Gothic sama, thus lonesome: “same in what unites that which belongs together” > Saying is in need of being voiced in word [Being needs man] > man’s needed usage (Brauchen), his resaying (Nachsagen) of what he listens to, lies in that lack (Fehlen) that isn’t negative or defective

HDG.TC.content: deliberately speaking of annihilation (Vernichtung), not just destruction (Zerstörung): annihilation is the more encompassing (umfassendere) destruction (also takes into account destruction of countless lives) > can only speak of annihilation by intimations (Andeutungen), point away from what is not meant > annihilation not the highest grade of destruction but essentially other (wesenhaft anderes) than destruction > always something left over w/ destruction, no “remainderless (restlose)” destruction > there is no annihilation at all: the destruction where nothing left remaining, this remainder (Übrig) is nothing: has consumed (aufgezehrt) every “is” & itself > from destruction to annihilation, a change of condition, leap into another essence > not only nothing still left remaining in annihilation, but something, and only, of its own arises (entsteht)

HDG.EC.content: overcome by something healing (Heilsames) on a walk: not just the capaciousness (Geräumige) of the expanse (Weite) but the expanse itself > carried to what is objectless w/out dissolving, expanse delivers our essence to the open (Offene), gathers it into simplicity: as if the expanse’s abiding (Verweilen) were a pure arrival (reine Ankunft)—we are the entranceway (Einlass) [cf. p. 147]

HDG.EC.content: did the younger man experience what is healing (das Heilsame) in contrast (Gegensatz) to the unwholesomeness (heillosen) of Camp? a fleeting self-deception? > no, because it has abided since morning in such a releasing (lösend), signifying (deutend), gathering manner…

HDG.EC.linkedContent: healing expanse not the forest, forest let into what heals

HDG.EC.content: malice is insurgency (Aufrührerische), das im Grimmigen beruht (rests in furiousness) > essence of evil is rage (Ingrimm) of insurgency (furiousness conceals this rage, in a certain sense) > perhaps the will itself is what is evil > yes, perhaps

HDG.EC.content: that which suffocates (Erstickende) does so hiding behind something insidious (Verfänglichen), that which announces (kundgibt) itself as one of man’s highest ideals: progress (Fortschritt), unrestrained achievement in all areas of creating, equal employment opportunities, & (the highest rationale) uniform welfare for all workers > what is really devastating is the way man obsesses with these goals (Ziele), devotes everything to their realization, driving on devastation (reinforcing its own consequences) [almost Freudian death drive logic]

HDG.EC.content: human individuals spurring on the devastation are subordinate to it, angry functionaries of their own mediocrity (Mittelmässigkeit), stand lower than wretched (Dürftige) who stand w/in their limits

HDG.EC.content: [can’t pass judgment on ontology of world-event] devastation comes forth from being, is a world-event (Weltereignis) that beleaguers (umlagert) the earth > person who passes judgment falls prey to quarreling/annoyance that gnaw at him, he becomes slave to self-righteousness (Selbstgerechtigkeit) [Nietzsche on revenge dimming one’s own eyes]

HDG.EC.content: death itself: something that waits in us > death waits upon our waiting > may we even ask what we wait for if we are properly waiting? [beyond Being] > when we wait upon something: Erwarten, in awaiting pure waiting is disturbed > pure waiting: wait upon nothing > but if we specifically wait upon Nothing, we are awaiting again > pure waiting: to wait on that which corresponds (entspricht) to pure waiting, better yet, that which answers (antwortet) pure waiting

HDG.EC.content: is waiting a safeguarding (Hüten)/tending (Pflegen) if we are waiting upon nothing? > waiting is letting come (Kommenlassen) [in the sense of safeguarding, that which is entrusted (anvertraut) to us] [must the entrusted be present or can it still be held in reserve (noch aufbehalten)?] > what do we let come? > we let come the coming [Derrida, a-venir, to-come] > to think of the coming (an das Kommen denken): an enigmatic commemorating (Andenken) > waiting is future-directed and thus reversed commemorating > but if waiting does not await, neither directed toward future or past, nor something already present

HDG.EC.content: this is all so simple & full of mystery, how could you know all this with such clarity since this morning? > in the simple experience (einfachen Erfahrung) of the coming, as that upon which we wait, what is healing draws near (naht), is granted (geworden) to us [so the experience is already the arrival?] > you say “to us” but it was only granted to you > I would like to share it now w/ you > my experience allows me to name for the you the wound beginning to heal, I was allowed/learned to presage (ahnen) [so priestly all this]

HDG.EC.content: the unnecessary is most necessary of all, only one who has learned this understands pain of human barred from thinking > thinking is thus the unnecessary, and yet thinking has a high rank of honor: the highest > I know this but don’t know the Grund of this > as if Occident couldn’t wait until thinking finds its originary essence: perhaps pure waiting, ability to wait [slow down, hastiness (Übereilung) of thinking thought as ratio, rationality]

HDG.EC.content: your experience of healing now heals me, letting us become those who wait > the far is near in the nearness of what is held in reserve (Aufbehaltenen), the farness (Ferne) of what is dear (Holden) > for those who wait, the difference (Unterschied) btwn near/far opens most purely > those who wait will guard themselves from hastening to know that which heals in itself

HDG.EC.content: those who wait learn right humble contentment (rechte Genügsamkeit), teachers of great poverty (Armut) > that which heals lets our essence wait: in waiting, human gathered in attentiveness to that which he belongs—can’t let himself get carried away (wegzuheben)/absorbed (aufzulösen) in it [danger of attention]

HDG.EC.content: waiting as though we pass unnoticed, unnamed [don’t know what we are], otherwise than all Erwarten, we’re not there for all who await/expect > in waiting, we’ve gone entirely away (ganz weggegangen), to our essence, required (gebraucht) by pure coming as inlet that answers it (als der Einlass, der ihm antwortet)

HDG.EC.content: if we were not already in essence those who wait, we could never become so [attention to Being] > we are only what we seek > seek only that on which we wait > wait on that in which we belong > we belong to the coming as the Gegenwart (present-waiting-toward) > as Gegenwart we release (lassen) ourselves to the coming, and in so releasing we 1st come into our own (eigen) > all these sentences say the selfsame > none can be preconceived, each thinks ahead (vordenkt) into the coming

Derrida to-come] > what heals can’t be set forth in propositional statements (in aussagenden Sätzen darstellen), but only conversationally surmised (gesprächsweise vermuten) [Derrida would say it can only be marked on the margins, nor would he call it what heals]

HDG.EC.content: those among a people (Volk) [Germans?] who poetize/think, wait in most noble manner: durch deren Gegenwart [through the present-waiting of the poet] zum Kommen das Wort in die Antwort des Menschenwesens gelangt und also in die Sprache gebracht wird > poets/thinkers wait on the arrival of this essence of theirs [devastation already passed over?], waiting people endangered like no other [rare], endangered not from outside threats but by tyranny of ignorant impatience, continual mistakes > Während dieses voreilige Scheinwesen [rash pseudo-essence] doch nur die ewig unbeholfene Nachahmung des Fremden bleibt [bad imitation of the foreign, Larry] > the people (Volk) who know its essence, can’t insist on it as a special calling (besondere Berufung)/distinction (Auszeichnung) > waiting people entirely unusable (unbrauchbar) to others, what waits yields nothing to be used (Nutzen) for progress > any fame of these people must be squander its essence purely on the unnecessary

HDG.EC.content: [facetiously?] what’s more necessary than “getting down to businesses with the given facts (Zupacken im Gegebenen), remaking what is present at hand, and moving forward w/ what has existed before (Vorwärtsbringen des Bisherigen)”? > that factual sense of reality (Tatsachensinn) lets man stand squarely on ground, validates, secures, effectuates (wirken), holds fast—and yet can’t be w/out the unnecessary (Unnötige)

HDG.OHF.content: Heidegger rails against those who “understand” only re: historical influences: nothing is expected of them, they care (sorgen) only about the pseudo (Pseudos)
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: Heidegger rails against those who “understand” only re: historical influences: nothing is expected of them, they care (sorgen) only about the pseudo (Pseudos)

HDG.OHF.content: re: Aristotle’s Peri Ermēneias, solely important [in this context] re: history of meaning of word: discourse (Rede) makes something accessible (zugänglich), brings out into open, ready to hand (vorhanden) > thus logos has distinctive possibility of alētheuein (being-true), making what was concealed unconcealed [comes to light through logos]

HDG.OHF.content: fundamental questionableness (Fraglichkeit) in Vorhabe, only as such could there be something like: “fixing” on an end (ein Ende “fest” machen), what is fixed on (or not) has being (Sein hat!) as a how of Dasein: how to relate this to death?

HDG.OHF.content: all talking about hermeneutics misunderstands it, the wakefulness for facticity must temporalize/unfold “there” > hermeneutics [Heidegger admits to making a personal statement] not philosophy at all, something preliminary (Vorläufiges), has its own explanation (Bewandtnis) for being: what’s at issue in it, not to be finished quickly, rather to hold out in it as long as possible (möglichste lange darin auszuhalten) [slow down] > we’ve become so weak-kneed, pithless, can’t hold out in asking a qustion

HDG.OHF.content: system as a context of classification (sketch out framework then allocate respective places for concrete beings) > the relational becomes the object proper, pushes to the fore: dominating/pervading everything, it constitutes being in authentic sense > the classificatory is immutable (Unwandelbare), elevated above what it organizes/rules, the trans-temporal in-itself (das überzeitliche Ansich) (being, validity [Gelten], value, subsistence [Bestehen]—contrasts sensible reality)

HDG.OHF.content: the being-context or validity-context of system either: 1) free-floating, absolutely valid in itself 2) or both what’s thought by Absolute spirit and its thinking (Hegel or Augustinian Neoplatonism)

HDG.OHF.content: “toward the objective,” “Platonism of barbarians” [reference to Republic], objective metaphysics: what kind of being stands in forehaving here? Vorhandensein, Gegenwärtigsein, the present transformation of culture > “Vorhaben, Vorgriff: bestimmen = übersehbar machen” [this final sentence seems to show that there is showing in defining limitations of today]

HDG.OHF.content: dialectic has same source in error (Fehlerquelle) of that which it wishes to remedy: steps into already constructed context, though really there’s no context here > what’s missing in dialectic: radical fundamental looking (radikale Grundblick) toward and at object of philosophy, from which (on basis of which), aus dem selbst, the How of what is understood emerges in unity

HDG.OHF.content: two modes of Dasein of today (Dasein im Heute) (discourse about Dasein) [initial givens of today, closest to us? (Zunächst des Heute)] (: 1) historical consciousness 2) philosophy > modes of interpreting, modes of Dasein’s having-itself in a definite manner, must interrogate these modes to interrogate Dasein of today, to subject the today to a destruction > genuine question of hermeneutics: what Seinscharakter of Dasein shows up (zeigt sich) [cf. Sage as showing] in these modes of having-itself (Sichselbstshabens)?

HDG.OHF.content: [method] [from] as what is factical Dasein being encountered in historical consciousness & philosophy? [to] what does factical Dasein have itself in these interpretations? [to] what is the having-itself-there of Da-sein as being, as a How of facticity, as an existential?
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [method] [from] as what is factical Dasein being encountered in historical consciousness & philosophy? [to] what does factical Dasein have itself in these interpretations? [to] what is the having-itself-there of Da-sein as being, as a How of facticity, as an existential?

HDG.OHF.content: “tarrying among (Verweilen bei)” sustains possibility of actualizing a universal classifying that compares [historical] forms, in it lies relational guarantee that every past culture can be encountered objectively > a constant seeing this & that, can never halt [cf. 45 abode-less tarrying (das aufenthaltslose Verweilen) that holds itself/sojourns in (Aufhalten) what it returns to) > what’s encountered in this Verweilen as universal possibility of expression, divided into unities of style: beings in the How of their having-being, already there [for us to see] (i.e. past is available, is a past present, not our virtuality) > a pull (Zug) arises from the already there (schon da) in the past: world, life, publicness, what was going on [if destruction occurs by thinking Zug outside of Zug of historical consciousness, deconstruction occurs by noting that Zug of historical consciousness never occurs, i.e that everyday facticity has been overdetermined, we were never that close to it]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: “tarrying among (Verweilen bei)” sustains possibility of actualizing a universal classifying that compares [historical] forms, in it lies relational guarantee that every past culture can be encountered objectively > a constant seeing this & that, can never halt [cf. 45 abode-less tarrying (das aufenthaltslose Verweilen) that holds itself/sojourns in (Aufhalten) what it returns to) > what’s encountered in this Verweilen as universal possibility of expression, divided into unities of style: beings in the How of their having-being, already there [for us to see] (i.e. past is available, is a past present, not our virtuality) > a pull (Zug) arises from the already there (schon da) in the past: world, life, publicness, what was going on [if destruction occurs by thinking Zug outside of Zug of historical consciousness, deconstruction occurs by noting that Zug of historical consciousness never occurs, i.e that everyday facticity has been overdetermined, we were never that close to it]

HDG.OHF.content: Heidegger believes it is best [why?] to treat everything said in today’s philosophy as pure/incontrovertible truth, not interested in truth/falsity of proposition but what goes on in this philosophy before it becomes what it is (was in dieser Philosophie vor sich geht) [hermeneutics as prior to philosophy] > methodology/logic couldn’t produce proper explanation because it would be a theory in same sense as this philosophy itself > Heidegger’s analysis will reactivate (nachvollziehen) step by step the context of its actualization (Vollzugszusammenhang) [cf. Derrida], bringing into relief how the object stands in view, how it is questioned, looked at, how concepts are being drawn (geschöpft) from it: ein Anspruch ganz primitiver Art (a quite primitive kind of claim/demand): can’t supply a basis (Boden) for this analysis

HDG.OHF.content: [method: Heidegger now tries to show what is there for Dasein in the 2 interpretative modes (philosophy, historical consciousness)] Dasein itself goes toward something, having itself objectively there for itself, bringing itself objectively into its there > historical consciousness & philosophy are modes of Dasein, paths held open (preserved in itself), paths of securing/making certain, paths of falling away > Dasein encounters itself free of standpoints in objective certainty: 1) historical consciousness, Dasein encounters wealth of objective being of its having-been (Gewesenseins) 2) philosophy, Dasein encounters immutability of its always-being-in-such-a-manner (Immersoseins) > both interpretations bring Dasein before its highest & pure present

HDG.OHF.content: forehaving: what is had in advance re: accessing/dealing w/ matter in question > fate of our approach (das Schicksal des Ansatzes) hangs on the primordiality (Ürsprunglichkeit) & genuineness (Echtheit) of the forehaving (in which Dasein as such [factical life] has been placed) [how can you ever assess forehaving unless you simply presume proximity?]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: forehaving: what is had in advance re: accessing/dealing w/ matter in question > fate of our approach (das Schicksal des Ansatzes) hangs on the primordiality (Ürsprunglichkeit) & genuineness (Echtheit) of the forehaving (in which Dasein as such [factical life] has been placed) [how can you ever assess forehaving unless you simply presume proximity?]

HDG.OHF.content: [prejudice of freedom from standpoints (Standpunktfreiheit)] elevates uncritical approach into 1st principle, promulgating fundamental blindness: “it cultivates a strange modesty and grants a general dispensation from critical questioning by means of the apparent self-evidence of what it demands”
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [prejudice of freedom from standpoints (Standpunktfreiheit)] elevates uncritical approach into 1st principle, promulgating fundamental blindness: “it cultivates a strange modesty and grants a general dispensation from critical questioning by means of the apparent self-evidence of what it demands”

HDG.OHF.content: free of standpoints only when there’s nothing to be done—but what if we have to look at things/research them? > free-standing detached standpoint = ruin of being-a-subject [is that now affirmative?] > developing our standpoint prior on the level of being > even unbiased seeing is a seeing, has a position in distinctive manner (appropriated so that it’s critically purged [kritischgereinigten]) > [so that an affirmative “freedom of standpoints” would be] an explicit (ausdrückliche) appropriation of our position of looking (Aneignung des Blickstandes), a position that is historical, not a chimerical in-itself outside of time

HDG.OHF.content: decisive for development (Ausbildung) of a forehaving: seeing Dasein in its everydayness (Alltäglichkeit) > [cf. p. 62] formal indication of forehaving, in average everydayness: factical life means being-in-a-world > what is meant by “world” by “in” by “being”? investigation of each word not piecemeal but one point of view on same unitary phenomenon [demonstrated in intuition?]

HDG.OHF.content: [preliminary descriptions of ready-to-hand & present-at-hand] total domain of what’s real: 1) things in nature 2) things of value > authentic being of table: material thing in space [?] [given “in the flesh (leibhafte)”]

HDG.OHF.content: as-what and How of the being-encountered (Begegnens) of what is close to us/given: significance > significant: being, being-there, in How of definite signifying/pointing (bestimmten Be-deutens) > wherein such definiteness consists, How a Dasein announces itself (sich bekundet), needs to be brought out from the concrete [?] > definiteness as disclosedness (Erschlossenheit): 1) availability in advance (Vorhandenheit) 2) advance appearance of a with-world (in dem mitweltlichen Vor-schein)
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: as-what and How of the being-encountered (Begegnens) of what is close to us/given: significance > significant: being, being-there, in How of definite signifying/pointing (bestimmten Be-deutens) > wherein such definiteness consists, How a Dasein announces itself (sich bekundet), needs to be brought out from the concrete [?] > definiteness as disclosedness (Erschlossenheit): 1) availability in advance (Vorhandenheit) 2) advance appearance of a with-world (in dem mitweltlichen Vor-schein)

HDG.OHF.content: Besorgenswege [ways of care]: the beings-which-are-there don’t stand w/in definiteness of definitions, but w/in everydayness & its historicity (Geschichtlichkeit); the there in advance (vorhandene Da) brings the appearance (Vorschein) of “others” into its Dasein > what one-self pursues, that wherein one tarries for a while, one-self (man-selbst) “is” this world: everydayness of Dasein has its Dasein there for itself, seeking it by heeding what others say about it: possibilities of familiarity (of everyday) are factically historical [Mitsein]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: Besorgenswege [ways of care]: the beings-which-are-there don’t stand w/in definiteness of definitions, but w/in everydayness & its historicity (Geschichtlichkeit); the there in advance (vorhandene Da) brings the appearance (Vorschein) of “others” into its Dasein > what one-self pursues, that wherein one tarries for a while, one-self (man-selbst) “is” this world: everydayness of Dasein has its Dasein there for itself, seeking it by heeding what others say about it: possibilities of familiarity (of everyday) are factically historical [Mitsein]

HDG.OHF.content: something that is there for us in the being-there of everdayness has forfeited (eingebüsst) authentic character of its there, now lingers in indifference of something we can ascertain > this ascertainability (Festsellbarkeit): not its being, but possibility of its being-an-object > in contrast: disclosedness of what has significance shows the something there in How of its Dasein [Heidegger follows this w/ condensed summary, beginning w/ “From out of…”]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: something that is there for us in the being-there of everdayness has forfeited (eingebüsst) authentic character of its there, now lingers in indifference of something we can ascertain > this ascertainability (Festsellbarkeit): not its being, but possibility of its being-an-object > in contrast: disclosedness of what has significance shows the something there in How of its Dasein [Heidegger follows this w/ condensed summary, beginning w/ “From out of…”]

HDG.OHF.content: “worldy (weltlich)” not as opposite of “in the mind” but: to be there as “world” > character of the being-there of this world can be terminologically designated significance: what constitutes the being of that which is there is its signifying, which is being encountered in a definite manner [signifying not something extra, added on]

HDG.OHF.content: das Daseiende begegnet im Wie des Besorgtseins, d. h. im Da, das in ein Besorgen gestellt ist [hermeneutic circle?] > the being-there encountered has its own temporality, as cared for in a wider sense [?] > we are concerned for what is not yet, what is approaching: kairological moments of being-there [ek-stasis]

HDG.OHF.content: “Aufhalten bei,” eine Vollzugs- und Zeitigungsweise > philosophical research as a definite kind of sojourning at home in, holding out there: facticity is what is primordial

HDG.OHF.content: der Einsatz (initial engagement & bringing into play), “as what” facticity is grasped/stirred in advance, arises out of fundamental experience, out of truth of primordial self-interpretation of philosophy
